title: Copying a received email attachment to a new outgoing message
content: How can I copy a received email to a new outgoing message I want to send?
creator: lfwestra

title: Thunderbird is not showing any new emails from Oct 10 2024
content: When I open thunderbird the newest message on both my email accounts are from Oct 10 2024, I have got many emails since then and they do not show up. Using the "get messages" button doesnt work and I went into troubleshoot mode but to no avail.
creator: jacob.turcotte11
